trans-unit.source: Defines an attribute that is used by ASP.NET server controls to indicate at design time whether nested content that is contained within a server control corresponds to controls or to properties of the server control.
This class cannot be inherited.
The PersistChildrenAttribute is used in combination with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> to determine how nested content of a control is interpreted.
If PersistChildrenAttribute is `true` and <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> is `false`, the nested content contained within an ASP.NET server control is persisted as controls.
If PersistChildrenAttribute is `false` and <xref:System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute> is `true`, the nested content is persisted as properties of the server control.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute"></xref> class using a Boolean value indicating whether to persist nested content as nested controls.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to persist the nested content as nested controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute"></xref> class using two Boolean values.
One indicating whether to persist nested content as nested controls and the other indicating whether to use a custom persistence method.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to persist nested content as nested controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use customized persistence; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Indicates the default attribute state.
The Default field is read-only.
The default value for the Default field is `Yes`, indicating that nested content is persisted at design time.
To be added.
Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current object.
The object to compare with the current object.
if obj is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
Serves as a hash function for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute"></xref> class.
A hash code for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute"></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether the value of the current instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute"></xref> class is the default value of the derived clss.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value of the current instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute"></xref> is the default instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Indicates that nested content should not persist as nested controls at design time.
This field is read-only.
If the No field is called, the inner content of a server control is persisted as properties, not as server.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the nested content is persisted as nested controls at design time.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to persist nested content as nested controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the server control provides custom persistence of nested controls at design time.
To configure nested content for custom persistence, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute> overload that takes a `usesCustomPersistence` parameter.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to provide custom persistence of nested content; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Indicates that nested content should persist as controls at design time.
The Yes field is read-only.
If the Yes field is called, nested content is persisted as controls.
To be added.
